title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The bug report is missing the observed behavior statement.
OB: When the Control Example is run and the window is resized in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, instead of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
SR:
Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example

1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
